channel.title: Best Dvd Burning Software and Best Dvd Converter?
channel.description:
Hey mates,
I was wondering, which dvd burner and dvd converter do you recommend? I bought Nero 7 premium a few months ago, but only started using it a few days ago. Nero is good, but is there any better dvd burning software? Also, how about a dvd converter? I currently use WinAvi, works well, but I would like a better converter if there is one. If you know of any good dvd burning software (better than Nero) or any good dvd converter (better than WinAvi), please let me know.

item.title: Best Dvd Burning Software and Best Dvd Converter?
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

ghostboy195:

DVD Decrypter and DVDShrink SHOULD be free. At least that’s how i found them, for free.

Yeah, I have them. They are free. I just burned a movie that I converted into divx format yesterday, but it didn’t work on my dvd player.

Thanks for replying.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Dvd Burning Software and Best Dvd Converter?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

DVD Decrypter - for burning DVD’s to you HD
CloneDVD - For burning DVD’s form you HD to a DVD
DVDShrink - for reducing the quality of the menues/extras if the dvd is bigger than 4.7 Gb so that it will fit

there is one program called sly soft that cracks all 3 of these, google it.

Read full topic
